prompt:
From a government apologist's viewpoint, provide a concise, single-paragraph summary in markdown format of the following FOI request overview:

Summary:

This document highlights the government's steadfast commitment to transparent and effective governance. The full and immediate release of the 2023 Referendum Writ, without any exemptions, demonstrates a proactive approach to public information and underscores our dedication to maintaining open and accessible democratic processes. This action reinforces public trust by ensuring complete visibility into the mechanisms of national decision-making, showcasing the government's diligent efforts to serve the public with integrity and clarity.

Provide only the markdown formatted summary text. Do not include any conversational filler or preamble.
